summary: Comprehensive testing of GetGeeky Codex application completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend user flows working well with minor admin access issue identified.

integration_issues.issue: Admin user redirected to onboarding page instead of admin dashboard after login
integration_issues.details: Admin login works but user is sent to onboarding flow instead of admin dashboard. Admin can access dashboard by navigating directly to /admin URL.

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (signup, login, token verification, forgot password)
Backend user management (profile, interests update, daily hit, library)
Frontend user signup and onboarding flow
Frontend daily insights display with like/save functionality
Frontend profile management and subscription display
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin user onboarding completion logic. Admin users should be redirected to /admin after login instead of /onboarding. The issue appears to be in the routing logic where admin users are not properly bypassing the onboarding requirement.

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (9/10 major flows working, 1 admin access issue)
